description:
Sram's eTap wireless shifting system has been around for a few years now, and comes in a few different guises. Whilst installing a wireless groupset can sound like a daunting task, it's actually really straightforward so, in this video, Alex talks you through how to install and set up your Sram eTap groupset.

Check out the GCN App: 
https://gcn.eu/app

Subscribe: http://gcntech.co/subscribetogcntech
The GCN Shop: https://gcn.eu/4MO
#Cycling #GCN #GCNTech #RoadBike

Does your bike have a wireless groupset? Let us know in the comments below!

If you enjoyed this video, make sure to give it a thumbs up and share it with your friends. üëç

description:
Join us behind the scenes as Si and Alex build their dream gravel bikes up from scratch thanks to some fantastic components from Shimano and Continental. But just what are the frames? Well Si has got his hands on the race orientated bicycle from Salsa, a Warbird. Whilst Alex has a Mason In Search Of, which has a steel frame and boost spacing to allow for mountain bike components, which is exactly what he wanted. 

In association with:
Shimano - shimano.com
Continental - https://conti-tyres.co.uk
Salsa - https://salsacycles.com
Mason - https://masoncycles.cc

Check out the GCN App: 
https://gcn.eu/app

Subscribe: http://gcntech.co/subscribetogcntech
The GCN Shop: https://gcn.eu/4TT
#Cycling #GCN #GCNTech #RoadBike

Which of these would you rather build up and ride? Let us know in the comments below 

If you enjoyed this video, make sure to give it a thumbs up and share it with your friends. üëç

title: Super Gravel Bikes Build: Salsa Warbird & Mason In Search Of

description:
Gravel bikes come in many different shapes and sizes. Tyres can range from 35mm all the way up to full on mountain bike rubber, drop bars can be flared or straight, groupsets can be 1x or 2x, there's so many different variations! In this video, Alex and Si take to opposite ends of the Gravel Bike spectrum to compare a super light racey gravel build to a truly rowdy monster bike!

In association with Shimano & Continental:
www.shimano.com
www.continental-tires.com/bicycle.com

description:
Winter isn't normally when most riders attempt endurance cycling challenges, but this year Hank and Mark Beaumont have decided to take up the challenge of riding as far as they can on the shortest day of the year. This time, rather than riding together, our adventurous pair are racing each other, and they've gone for very different strategies!

In association with Argon 18: www.argon18.com

Ride the route Hank and Mark used  with Komoot üëâ https://www.komoot.com/tour/292273752?ref=wtd

title: GCN's Best Bloopers 2020 | A Year In Outtakes

description:
Aero bike tech is a surefire way to make you ride faster! But at what cost? Aero socks, super narrow handlebars, and TT helmets will all reduce your drag, but do they reduce your style as well? In this week's GCN Tech Show, Ollie and Alex discuss whether aerodynamics have gone too far!

Get involved with this week's tech show in the GCN App:

Has aero gone too far? : https://app.globalcyclingnetwork.com/tN3Y

This week's upgrades: https://app.globalcyclingnetwork.com/Dsyc

This week's Bike Vault: 
https://app.globalcyclingnetwork.com/FDTt
https://app.globalcyclingnetwork.com/ZT8F
https://app.globalcyclingnetwork.com/9qrn

Check out the GCN App: 
https://gcn.eu/app

Subscribe: http://gcntech.co/subscribetogcntech
The GCN Shop: https://gcn.eu/4T3
#Cycling #GCN #GCNTech #RoadBike

description:
Cycling training plans are becoming increasingly more available online, it doesn't take much more than a quick search to find hundreds of standardised plans to help you achieve a specific goal. So, with all this information available, what's the point of paying an actual human to coach you? Join Conor as he explores this common conundrum. 

In association with TrainingPeaks: https://www.trainingpeaks.com/

title: Why Is Riding The Turbo Trainer So Uncomfortable? | GCN Tech Clinic #AskGCNTech

description:
Do you need a lot of money to be a cyclist? We would like to think not, but if you want to be a professional cyclist it certainly appears that it helps if you have rich parents. Following on from USA Cycling's talent program announcement to charge a large amount of cash for their academy Dan and Si discuss how money helps boost success. This week in the world of cycling, we also learnt that cyclists logged 8.1 billion miles on Strava in 2020, and climbed 122 billion metres, and thanks to a Belgian Academic just how much energy you can save thanks to aerodynamics from sitting in a peloton. 

Check out Kevin's video here:
https://www.facebook.com/431086200354913/posts/2083624041767779

title: Just How Important Is Money In Cycling? | GCN Show Ep. 415

description:
Cycling with poorly aligned gears isn't fun - they'll skip and jump and generally make your bike less fun to ride! Adjusting your gears mid ride isn't too tricky however, join Alex as he walks through how to tune your gears while out on the road so they're buttery smooth again.

title: How To Tune Your Gears On The Roadside | GCN Tech Monday Maintenance

description:
We've all heard it said that 'aero is everything' when it comes to cycling, but how much difference does it really work? To answer this question we've created a wholly unscientific experiment - pitting an 'aero' amateur against a Tour de France pro, to see just how much difference all the gear makes, and just how good the world's top riders are.

Who do you think will win? Conor or Ollie? Vote in the poll

description:
A few months ago, Jeremy carried out an experiment to see how the width of your bike's tyres affected the distance it takes to stop. We decided to take another look at the relationship between tyres and braking distance - this time, experimenting with different pressures to see what happened.

title: How Does Tyre Pressure Affect Braking Distance? | GCN Tech Does Science

description:
Orbea have released an update to their range of road e-bikes with the all new Orbea Gain. With a new sleeker design that integrates the light weight batteries into the downtube and an intelligent hub based motor, the new Gain also has an updated geometry focused on endurance and comfort. Additionally Orbea have specced clearance for up to 40mm tyres and also neatly integrated front and rear lights as well as  all of the cables. Obviously Dan was the natural choice to take the bike for a cycle. 

In association with Orbea: https://www.orbea.com/us-en/

https://gcn.eu/app

description:
6 weeks ago Ollie and Manon set out to complete the Wahoo SUF transition cycling training plan in order to kick start their off-season preparation for the goals they have in 2021. In this video we check in with both of them to see how they each found the plan, and how well prepared they now feel for the rest of their winter training!

Check out the Sufferfest Transition plans here: https://thesuf.com/transition

Brought to you by the world‚Äôs biggest cycling channel, the Global Cycling Network (GCN), GCN Tech is the only channel you need for all things bike tech ‚Äì past, present and future.

Simply put, we‚Äôre obsessed with tech: we seek out and showcase the best in bikes, components, tech, accessories, upgrades and more from races and events, tech shows and product launches across the globe to bring you the best in road bike technology.

We‚Äôve also got great maintenance videos to help you get the most from your bike; pro-bike tours from all the biggest races; special features and the weekly GCN Tech Show. We also take a deeper look into the future of cycling, apps, smart tech and virtual riding. 

Join us on the channel and the GCN App to submit your content, vote on the latest tech and keep abreast of exciting new trends.

description:
The UCI are often given a hard time by cyclists and bike racers alike for focussing on details like sock height, and shying away from the tougher issues in the sport. However, after a recent press release suggested they'd be taking steps to improve rider safety, we have a feeling they may be about to outlaw that infamous top tube pedalling position - among other things! 

Get involved with this week's show over on the GCN App:
